title: Just passed 2000 wins, could I possibly play with riot?
body: pretty please? :D it's a milestone after all, if not then thats perfectly fine, just trying my luck, haha

replies.body: Ty! But that means I'll have to delete you if i want to add you :P

Hahaha,

Let me know when you're free for a game. happy to play a norms on this wondrous occasion!
